predicate.note: Frames file for 'skirt' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: The ground along the Embarcadero the street that [*T*-1] skirts the city 's eastern boundary and piers -- dropped six inches after the quake , [*] wreaking major damage to at least one of the piers .
example.arg: the city 's eastern boundary and piers

example.name: transitive
example.text: But Mr. Breeden , a 39-year-old securities lawyer , has skirted some of the heftier issues facing the financial markets .
